title: Raymond Blanc's chocolate mousse
description: Raymond Blanc shows you how to make an easy, 4-ingredient chocolate mousse with his classic recipe.
ingredients: 170g/6oz good-quality dark chocolate, minimum 60 per cent cocoa solids, roughly chopped (dairy free, if necessary)
7 free-range egg whites (use pasteurised egg white in a carton if you have any concerns about raw egg)
